TI_TEXT.P: Услуги на здравеопазването и социалните дейности

Services de santé et services sociaux

Servizzi dwar saħħa ta' xogħol soċjali

Serviços de saúde e acção social

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: NHS South Tees Clinical Commissioning Group

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: NHS South Tees Clinical Commissioning Group
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: North Ormesby Health Village, First Floor, 14 Trinty Mews, North Ormesby

SHORT_DESCR.P: GP Extended Services for the population of South Tees. Services to operate from 18:30 — 21:30 Monday — Friday and 8:00-21:30 Saturday and Sunday and Bank Holidays. To be delivered from 4 hubs located at: East Cleveland Primary Care Hospital, Redcar Primary Care Hospital, Unit 11 North Ormesby Health Village and One Life Middlesbrough.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: In order to deliver services the provider must have access to Patient Records and the Patient list to ensure that screening programmes and management of long term conditions can be delivered during GP extended services.

MAIN_FEATURES_AWARD.P: Three stage evaluation process consisting of; compliance check, capability and capacity and technical evaluation. Technical evaluation included a range of pass/fail questions and also requirement to meet 50 % of scores available for questions which tested; clinical and service delivery, social value, performance management, workforce and IM&T.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: North of England Commissioning Support Unit

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: The Contracting Authorities will act in accordance with Part 3 Chapter 5 Regulation 85 to 87 and Regulation 95 of the Public Contract Regulations 2015 (SI 2015 No 102) (PCR 2015). Part 3 of the PCR 2015 provides for appeals to be made to the High Court subject to the time limitations and other required procedural steps. The rules relating to appeal are complex and a dissatisfied tenderer is advised to take their own prompt legal advice.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Royal Courts of Justice — The High Court
